FuncDef:
The default-cost command sets the default cost for imported routes.
The undo default-cost command restores the default cost (0).
By default, the default cost for imported routes is 0.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the default cost for imported routes.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 15.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can perform any of the following operations to set the cost for imported routes and the costs configured in the operations are in descending order of priorities:
Run the apply cost command to set the cost for routes.Run the import-route (RIPng) command to set the cost for imported routes.Run the default-cost (RIPng) command to set the default cost for imported routes.
